Text: EES SAP Reference Materialdo not reply to this message Your response will be distributed to ALL EES Employees including EES Executives For your convenience we have provided a detailed listing of contact information of the EES SAP Team A Message from your EES SAP Team As you already know the legacy MSA system for EES is scheduled to go away on July with the implementation of SAP In order to smooth the transition the EES SAP Team will start distributing key information to every employee at EES through Lotus Notes With this in mind attached below are several files that will help ease the transition to SAP Please keep this email for future reference For these and other helpful documents please visit the Apollo website or our EES SAP website visioncommsap both of which will be updated with any changes going forward For questions please contact the EES SAP Finance Support Staff Kem Miller Chip Brenner Murthy Rao COE Help Desk SAP For other SAP related questions please contact the EES SAP Site Managers Bobby Mahendra Finance Daler Wade HR We look forward to a smooth transition to SAP Please review the attachments below ATTACHMENTS this information is valid as of Any updates to this information will be posted to the respective websites The following attachment contain a list of all MSA RCs and their corresponding SAP Cost Centers In SAP the Company Code is digits with a preface eg is now Please note that after Go Live July MSA RCs will be replaced with SAP Cost Centers The following attachment relates to common expense coding For some SAP accounts a functional area andor a material number is required for specific tracking purposes A SAP Employee Expense Report Accounts Payable requires you to fill out a SAP Invoice Coding Sheet when sending an invoice for payment in place of the current Invoice Stamp Useful only for people who code expenses or time to E Work Orders the following is the conversion list of all MSA E Work Orders to SAP Stat Orders A detailed SAP Chart of Accounts Useful only for people who code expenses or time to S Work Orders the following is the conversion list of all MSA S and J Work Orders to SAP WBS Elements Projects
